body_html:
Ok, MKL is a completely different league than all the others. That is protected code by Intel highly optimized for their Intel CPU's. TF on the CPU (hence Eigen) can't compete with that because TF must run on any machine, e.g. also on AMD CPUs.
That the GPU-version is that much slower is still surprising.

Side note: It is possible that Eigen also uses MKL in the backend.
https://eigen.tuxfamily.org/dox/TopicUsingIntelMKL.html
Can this be enabled for TF as well?

body:
Ok, MKL is a completely different league than all the others. That is protected code by Intel highly optimized for their Intel CPU's. TF on the CPU (hence Eigen) can't compete with that because TF must run on any machine, e.g. also on AMD CPUs.
That the GPU-version is that much slower is still surprising.

Side note: It is possible that Eigen also uses MKL in the backend.
https://eigen.tuxfamily.org/dox/TopicUsingIntelMKL.html
Can this be enabled for TF as well?
